    • Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class Enemy
extends java.lang.Object

      • move

        public void move(java.lang.String movement)
        Method that provides the movement for an enemy. It takes as string for the movement and computes the new position of the enemy. It will return an error message if the users tries to move the enemy out of the grid.
        Parameters:
        movement -
